name: Vietnamese Spicy Salmon & Veg Spring Rolls
step_by_step: Julienne carrot & asparagus, slice tomato into thin wedges
Rub salmon with minced chili, salt, pepper; sear in hot olive oil 2 min/side until just cooked, flake
Whisk egg with pinch salt, make 2 thin omelettes; cool then slice into ribbons
Quick-pickle carrot & asparagus in 1:1 rice-vinegar & warm water + sugar + chili for 5 min
Dip rice paper in warm water 3 s, lay flat; layer spinach, salmon, omelette ribbons, tomato, carrot/asparagus pickle, crushed peanuts
Blitz 2 tbsp peanuts + 1 chili + 1 tsp olive oil + tomato pulp for dipping sauce
